Html:
I would like to look at the new version of RAWR but Elitist Jerks is blocked at work, as are most game sites.

Would it be possible to have a link from here somewhere, rather than having to go to ElitistJerks site?

Or have I missed something?

Rawr (NOT RAWR) is generated inside that ej link. there is no alternate posting. you could download and compile it yourself using the threads already available on that subject, but if work blocked the page they probably dont want you doing that either.

That's a shame. I guess I could compile it , but it would mean doing it every time there is a change.

It isn't my company that blocks it. Like most companies the internect connection is managed by a third party.

We are fine to use the internet for personal use at lunchtime etc.
